document.masterDocTitle: A taxonomic review of the genus Eoophyla Swinhoe, 1900 (Lepidoptera: Crambidae: Acentropinae) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A taxonomic review of the genus Eoophyla Swinhoe, 1900 (Lepidoptera: Crambidae: Acentropinae) from China

subSubSection.paragraph:
Eoophyla nigripilosa Yoshiyasu, 1987
, Microlep. Thai. , 1: 170; Speidel & Mey, 1999a, Tijds. v. Ent. , 142: 130; Li, You & Wang, 2003, Acta Zootaxonomica Sinica , 28(2): 299. Type-locality: Thailand .

Material examined. Yunnan , Xishuangbanna , Mengla ,
670 m
, 1♂ ,
1974. V
.1–5, Zhou Yao ( NKU )
.
Distribution. China ( Fujian , Guangdong , Yunnan ), Thailand .

tableNote.paragraph: 1 Androconial hairs account ratio for the cell
2 The numbers of eyespots on hindwing
3 Specialized setae numbers, ratio for the length of valva and shapes of their apex
4 Singa numbers, ratio for the length of corpus bursae

subSubSection.paragraph: Funding The research was financially supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (31772489).
Acknowledges We are very grateful to Mr. Shimei Song (IZCAS) for providing great help for our work, and Dr. Houhun Li (Nankai University) for providing materials of the genus.
